name: Bootleg Swamp Stomp (WONKWARE™)
description:
BOOTLEG SWAMP STOMP 
[Extra Swamp Extra Stomp Edition]
all that is good is nasty

CONTROLS:

Right Stick: move right leg.

Left Stick: move left leg.

Any shoulder / bumper: STOMP!

See how long you can keep the groove alive by stomping dirty, smelly, bootleg records before they reach the DJ's!

Only stomp these dudes!

Keep your integrity meter filled for as long as you can! 

Keep bootleg records from getting to the DJs but allow good records to pass through to boost your integrity!
